overview: This intimate portrait of director, producer, and improvisational comedy icon Mike Nichols shows his final and historic interviews filmed just months before his death. Director Douglas McGrath documents Nichols’s early life, as he opens up to his friend, director Jack O’Brien, about the storied beginnings of his career.
tagline: Becoming a Comedian. Becoming a Director. Becoming a Filmmaker.
title: Becoming Mike Nichols
